segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### Faster builds

translations.zh-hant: ### 更快的建構速度

segments.source_content: We worked hard to reduce the time it takes to build a Docusaurus site in production mode.

translations.zh-hant: 我們致力於縮短 Docusaurus 網站在生產模式下的建構時間。

segments.source_content: Between v3.1.0 and v3.2.0, several changes have been made, leading to significantly faster production builds for many sites.

translations.zh-hant: 在 v3.1.0 和 v3.2.0 之間，我們進行了多項改進，使多數網站的生產環境建構速度顯著提升。

segments.source_content: Let's take an example. Our benchmark on the [React Native website upgrading to v3.2](https://github.com/facebook/react-native-website/pull/4072) reports the following results:

translations.zh-hant: 以實際案例說明。我們在[React Native 網站升級至 v3.2](https://github.com/facebook/react-native-website/pull/4072)的基準測試中獲得以下結果：

segments.source_content:
- 🔥 Cold builds: 95s ➡️ 66s (~30% faster)
- 🔥 Incremental builds: 55s ➡️ 22s (~60% faster)
The results will vary depending on your site's topology and the options you turned on, but we expect the largest sites will see the most significant improvements.

translations.zh-hant: 實際效果會因網站結構和啟用選項而異，但我們預期大型網站將獲得最顯著的改善。

segments.source_content: Note that this is only the beginning, and Docusaurus performance can still be significantly improved, notably the bundling time and the memory consumption. Track our [performance issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4765) for upcoming improvements.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意這只是開始，Docusaurus 在打包時間和記憶體消耗等方面仍有大幅優化空間。請追蹤我們的[效能改進議題](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4765)獲取後續更新。

segments.source_content:
<details>
  <summary>What is the difference between a cold build and an incremental build?</summary>

A cold build is when the Docusaurus caches are empty, generally after running `docusaurus clear`.

An incremental build happens when you run another time the `docusaurus build` command. Docusaurus automatically tries to "re-use" computations from former builds to make subsequent builds faster. In practice it's based on [Webpack persistent caching](https://webpack.js.org/guides/build-performance/#persistent-cache). To enable incremental builds on your CI server, you can persist the `node_modules/.cache` folder across builds.

</details>

segments.source_content: ### Faster Dev Server

translations.zh-hant: ### 更快的開發伺服器

segments.source_content: We also worked on improving the performance of the dev server, so that you can get a faster feedback when editing Markdown/MDX files.

translations.zh-hant: 我們同時優化了開發伺服器的效能，讓您在編輯 Markdown/MDX 檔案時能獲得即時反饋。

segments.source_content: The way we initially implemented content reloading wasn't great. For example, editing a blog post file would also trigger a useless reload of the unrelated docs plugin. From now on, when editing a plugin's content, only that plugin will reload. It's hard to measure precisely the impact of this change, but I estimate edits should appear in your browser at least 50% faster 🔥.

translations.zh-hant: 先前內容重新載入的實現方式不夠理想。例如編輯部落格文章時，會無差別地觸發無關文件外掛的重新載入。現在開始，編輯某個外掛的內容時，只會重新載入該外掛。雖然難以精確量化，但我估計瀏覽器中的編輯預覽速度至少提升50% 🔥。

segments.source_content: We plan to keep improving the speed of our dev server, with even more granular hot reloads, ensuring we don't run useless computations that would always keep giving the same result.

translations.zh-hant: 我們計劃持續改進開發伺服器速度，透過更細粒度的熱重載機制，避免執行無效的重複運算。

segments.source_content: ### MDX partials table-of-contents

translations.zh-hant: ### MDX 片段目錄支援

segments.source_content: With [#9684](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9684), Docusaurus is now able to render headings coming from an imported partial into the table-of-contents.

translations.zh-hant: 透過 [#9684](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9684)，Docusaurus 現在能將導入片段中的標題渲染至目錄中。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus and MDX allows you to [import one Markdown file into another](/docs/markdown-features/react#importing-markdown). We usually call the imported Markdown file a "partial", and use the `_` prefix so that this file does not lead to the creation of a new page.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 和 MDX 允許您[將 Markdown 檔案導入至其他檔案](/docs/markdown-features/react#importing-markdown)。我們通常將被導入的 Markdown 檔案稱為「片段」，並使用 `_` 前綴來避免產生獨立頁面。

segments.source_content:
```md title="myDoc.mdx"
# My Doc

## Doc heading

Content is imported from another MDX file:

import ImportedDoc from './\_importedDoc.mdx';

<ImportedDoc />
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c05ad55e

segments.source_content:
```md title="_myPartial.mdx"
## Partial heading

Some paragraph
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_bc137a19

segments.source_content: Previously, the heading `Partial heading` did not appear in the table-of-contents, but now it will!

translations.zh-hant: 過去「片段標題」不會出現在目錄中，但現在可以了！

segments.source_content: ### Blog improvements

translations.zh-hant: ### 部落格功能強化

segments.source_content: We improved the blog plugin with several new options to make it even more powerful and flexible:

translations.zh-hant: 我們為部落格外掛新增多項選項，使其更加強大靈活：

segments.source_content:
- [#9912](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9912): you can now display the last update time and author of a blog post, a feature the docs plugin already had.
- [#9886](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9886): a new `processBlogPosts` option allow you to filter/transform/sort blog posts.
- [#9838](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9838): a new `pageBasePath` option allows you to customize the blog pagination URL segment (`/blog/page/2`)

translations.zh-hant:
- [#9912](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9912)：現在可顯示部落格文章的最後更新時間與作者，此功能原本僅限文件外掛使用。
- [#9886](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9886)：新增 `processBlogPosts` 選項用於過濾/轉換/排序文章。
- [#9838](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9838)：新增 `pageBasePath` 選項可自訂分頁網址段（如 `/blog/page/2`）

segments.source_content: ### Sitemap lastmod

translations.zh-hant: ### 網站地圖 lastmod 支援

segments.source_content: With [#9954](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9954), the sitemap plugin has a new `lastmod` option that can now emit a `<lastmod>` tag on the XML. The value is read from the Git history by default, but can be overridden with docs and blog `last_update` front matter.

translations.zh-hant: 透過 [#9954](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9954)，網站地圖插件新增了 `lastmod` 選項，現在可以在 XML 中輸出 `<lastmod>` 標籤。預設情況下會從 Git 歷史記錄中讀取該值，但也可以透過文件與部落格的 `last_update` 前置資料來覆寫。

segments.source_content: We also made it possible to opt-out of emitting `<priority>` and `<frequency>` tags, which are generally ignored by crawlers (notably [Google](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2023/06/sitemaps-lastmod-ping)).

translations.zh-hant: 我們也讓使用者可以選擇不輸出 `<priority>` 和 `<frequency>` 標籤，這些標籤通常會被爬蟲程式忽略（尤其是 [Google](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2023/06/sitemaps-lastmod-ping)）。

segments.source_content: We recommend using the following sitemap plugin config, that will become the default in Docusaurus V4:

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議使用以下網站地圖插件配置，這將成為 Docusaurus V4 的預設值：

segments.source_content:
```js
{
  lastmod: 'date',
  priority: null,
  changefreq: null,
}
```

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content:
- [#9687](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9687): new Vercel Analytics plugin
- [#9681](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9681) and [#9442](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9442): `docusaurus swizzle` and `create-docusaurus` CLIs now ask users if they prefer to use TypeScript
- [#9928](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9928): new Icelandic translation
- [#9928](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9931): new `allContentLoaded` plugin lifecycle (experimental)

translations.zh-hant:
- [#9687](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9687)：新增 Vercel Analytics 插件
- [#9681](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9681) 和 [#9442](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9442)：`docusaurus swizzle` 和 `create-docusaurus` CLI 現在會詢問使用者是否偏好使用 TypeScript
- [#9928](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9928)：新增冰島語翻譯
- [#9928](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9931)：新增 `allContentLoaded` 插件生命週期（實驗性功能）
